name: Oyster Grilling in Historic Mid-City
description: We'll meet at Jazz after Dark. After introductions and a complementary cocktail, we'll move to the courtyard for a hands-on oyster preparation and cooking demo.

guide.name: Aneesa Travis
guide.biography: Having traveled the world and tasted the best it has to offer, Aneesa is excited to show you the best of her hometown!

name: Garden District Food and History Tour
description: The Garden District mansions, cemeteries, and ancient live oaks are a feast for a eyes that pairs perfectly with the Creole feast we have planned for the rest of you!

guide.name: Louie Martin
guide.biography: A Mid-City native, Louie works with local chefs and artists, many who are life-long friends, to welcome newcomers to the city the best way he knows how: through food!
